short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The quintessential Lorem Ipsum generator for instant access to chunks of your favorite blind text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the Instant Ipsum action button once and a sentence of Lorem Ipsum will be copied to the clipboard.
Click it twice repeatedly, get two sentences.
Click three times for 3 sentences, and so on...
Each click adds another sentence to the snippet.

Click, click, click, paste - repeat.
